cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8)
project(NANOPB_CMAKE_SIMPLE C)

set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH $***REMOVED***CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR***REMOVED***/../../extra)
find_package(Nanopb REQUIRED)
include_directories($***REMOVED***NANOPB_INCLUDE_DIRS***REMOVED***)

nanopb_generate_cpp(PROTO_SRCS PROTO_HDRS simple.proto)
include_directories($***REMOVED***CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR***REMOVED***)
#add_custom_target(generate_proto_sources DEPENDS $***REMOVED***PROTO_SRCS***REMOVED*** $***REMOVED***PROTO_HDRS***REMOVED***)
set_source_files_properties($***REMOVED***PROTO_SRCS***REMOVED*** $***REMOVED***PROTO_HDRS***REMOVED***
    PROPERTIES GENERATED TRUE)

set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "$***REMOVED***CMAKE_C_FLAGS***REMOVED*** -Wall -Werror -g -O0")

add_executable(simple simple.c $***REMOVED***PROTO_SRCS***REMOVED*** $***REMOVED***PROTO_HDRS***REMOVED***)
